svg.text: This Continuous Time model uses a Finite State Machine and the GR domain to create a simplified version of the game Pong.
This example requires Java3D. If you do not have it installed, you can get it from: http://java.sun.com/products/java-media/3D/

property.name: setActions
property.value: free.x_initialPosition = x_initialPosition; free.x_initialVelocity = x_initialVelocity; free.y_initialPosition = y_initialPosition; free.y_initialVelocity = y_initialVelocity; free.x_acceleration = x_initialAcceleration; free.y_acceleration = y_initialAcceleration
